item.title: Python Use
item.description: install.packages("reticulate") ## Installing package into '/stor/home/ss77555/R/x86_64-pc-linux-gnu-library/3.4' ## (as 'lib' is unspecified) library(reticulate) Python Lately weâ€™ve been learning new features via python and they have been been remarkable useful even many aspects including biology. Working in labs there are times when we need to analyze DNA sequences but it can get quite tedious to do it by hand. A good example of the application of python in biological analytics was in HW 11 from my SDS348 class.
